title: Iron kiteshield

properties.value: The Iron kiteshield is the second-weakest smithable kiteshield, requiring 1 Defence to wield. A player with 27 Smithing can make the shield by using three iron bars on an anvil while carrying a hammer, granting 75 Smithing experience. It cannot be bought from Cassie's Shield Shop for ironmen, as there is no stock available.

Item ID1191

The Iron kiteshield is the second-weakest smithable kiteshield, requiring 1 Defence to wield. A player with 27 Smithing can make the shield by using three iron bars on an anvil while carrying a hammer, granting 75 Smithing experience. It cannot be bought from Cassie's Shield Shop for ironmen, as there is no stock available.

 Attack bonuses

[[File:Iron kiteshield detail.png|left|130px]]
The '''Iron kiteshield''' is the second-weakest smithable [[kiteshield]], requiring 1 [[Defence]] to wield. A player with 27 [[Smithing]] can make the shield by using three [[iron bar]]s on an [[anvil]] while carrying a [[hammer]], granting 75 Smithing [[experience]]. It cannot be bought from [[Cassie's Shield Shop]] for [[ironmen]], as there is no stock available.
